src_original: pañca ca bhikṣuśatāni dhyānalābhīni utthāyāsanebhyaḥ prakrāntāni imāṃ gambhīrāṃ dharmadeśanāmanavabudhyamānāni anavataranti anavagāhamānāni anadhimucyamānāni /
tgt_original: 「是五百守禪比丘，聞深經不解不信摩訶而去。

src_original: bhagavānāha- tathā hyete kāśyapa bhikṣavaḥ ābhimānikāḥ imāmanāsravāṃ śīlaviśuddhiṃ nāvataranti nāvagāhante nādhimucyante uttrasyanti saṃtrasyanti saṃtrāsamāpadyante /  gambhīraḥ kāśyapa gāthābhinirhāro gambhīrā ca buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ bodhiḥ /
tgt_original: 」佛語迦葉：

src_original: sā na śakyā anavaropitakuśalamūlaiḥ sattvaiḥ pāpamitraparigṛhītairanadhimuktibahulairadhimoktum /
tgt_original: 「是五百守禪比丘信餘眾多，聞深法教不解不信。

src_original: etāni kāśyapa pañca bhikṣuśatāni kāśyapasya tathāgatasya pravacane 'nyatīrthikaśrāvakā abhūvan /  taireva tasya kāśyapasya tathāgatasyāntikādupālambhābhiprāyaireṣā dharmadeśanā śrutā /  śrutvā ca ekacittaprasādo labdhaḥ /
tgt_original: 「是五百比丘者，乃前迦葉佛時皆作婆羅門道，於迦葉佛所，一返聞經道心意樂喜，即時五百人自說言：

src_original: evaṃtairvāg bhāṣitā- āścaryaṃ yāvat madhurapriyamāṇī kāśyapastathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddha iti /
tgt_original: 『迦葉佛所說快。

src_original: ta etenaikacittaprasādena pratilabdhena kālagatāḥ trāyastriṃśeṣu deveṣūpapannāḥ /
tgt_original: 』乃爾五百人得是福祐，壽終皆生忉利天上。

src_original: tānyetāni kāśyapa pañca bhikṣuśatāni dṛṣṭipraskandhāni imāṃ gambhīrāṃ dharmadeśanāṃ  nāvataranti nāvagāhante nādhimucyante uttrasyanti saṃtrasyanti saṃtrāsamāpadyante
tgt_original: 「五百比丘得是福已，後於我法中作沙門，今聞深經不解不信。 」佛語迦葉言：

src_original: kṛtaṃ punareṣāmanayā dharmadeśanayā parikarma /  na bhūyo durgativinipātaṃ gamiṣyanti /  ebhireva ca skandhaiḥ parinirvāsyanti //
tgt_original: 「是五百比丘持是所聞深經，得不墮惡道，於今世皆當得阿羅漢般泥洹去。

src_original: atha khalu bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimāmantrayate sma- gaccha subhūte,
tgt_original: 」佛語須菩提言：

src_original: etān bhikṣūn saṃjñapatha /
tgt_original: 「汝行教五百亡去比丘令來還。

src_original: subhūtirāha- bhagavata eva tāvadete bhāṣitaṃ vilomayanti,  kaḥ punarvādo mama?
tgt_original: 」須菩提白佛言： 「是五百比丘尚不欲聞佛所說，何肯隨小羅漢語乎？

src_original: atha bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāṃ yena mārgeṇaite bhikṣāvo gacchanti sma,  tasmin mārge drau bhikṣū nirmimīte sma /
tgt_original: 」佛即時化作兩比丘，於五百比丘前徐行。

src_original: atha tāni pañca bhikṣuśatāni yena mārgeṇa tau dvau bhikṣū nirmitakau tenopasaṃkrāmanti sma /
tgt_original: 五百比丘皆使行，及前兩比丘，五百比丘問前兩比丘言：

src_original: upasaṃkramya etadavocan- kutra āyuṣmantau gamiṣyathaḥ?
tgt_original: 「二賢者欲何至湊？ 」兩比丘報言：

src_original: tāvavocatām- gamiṣyāva āvāmaraṇyāyataneṣu /  tatra dhyānasukhasaṃsparśavihārairvihariṣyāvaḥ //
tgt_original: 「欲到空閑山中安隱之處，自守坐禪不能復憂餘。

src_original: ..... tānyapi pañca bhikṣuśatānyetadavocan- vayamapyāyuṣmantau bhagavato dharmadeśanāṃ nāvatarāmo nāvagāhāmahe nādhimucyāmahe uttrasyāmaḥ saṃtrasyāmaḥ saṃtrāsamāpadyāmahe /
tgt_original: 」五百人復問言： 「何以故？ 」兩比丘復報言： 「佛所說深經，我不信不解也。 」五百人復報言：

src_original: atha khalu tāni pañcamātrāṇi bhikṣuśatāni bhagavato dharmadeśanāmanavatarantyanavagāhamānānyanadhimucyamānāni utthāyāsanebhyaḥ prakrāntāni /
tgt_original: 「是五百比丘尚不欲聞佛所說，何肯隨小羅漢語乎？

src_original: atha bhagavān [tasyāṃ velāyāṃ] yena mārgeṇaite bhikṣavo gacchanti sma,  tasmin mārge dvau bhikṣū nirmimīte sma //
tgt_original: 」佛即時化作兩比丘，於五百比丘前徐行。

src_original: atha tāni pañca bhikṣuśatāni yena [mārgeṇa] tau dvau bhikṣū [nirmitakau] tenopasaṃkrāmanti sma /
tgt_original: 五百比丘皆使行，及前兩比丘，五百比丘問前兩比丘言：

src_original: upasaṃkramya tāvavocan- kutrāyuṣmantau gamiṣyathaḥ?
tgt_original: 「二賢者欲何至湊？ 」兩比丘報言：

src_original: nirmitakāvavocatām- gamiṣyāva āvāmaraṇyāyataneṣu,  tatra dhyānasukhasparśavihārairvihariṣyāvaḥ /
tgt_original: 「欲到空閑山中安隱之處，自守坐禪不能復憂餘。

src_original: tamāvāṃ nāvatarāvo nāvagāhāvahe nādhimucyāmahe uttrasyāvaḥ saṃtrāsamāpadyāvahe /
tgt_original: 「佛所說深經，我不信不解也。

src_original: atha tāni pañca bhikṣuśatānyetadavocan- vayamapyāyuṣmanto bhagavato dharmadeśanāṃ nāvatarāmo nāvagāhāmahe nādhimucyāmahe uttrasyāmaḥ saṃtrasyāmaḥ saṃtrāsamāpadyāmahe /  tena vayamaraṇyāyataneṣu dhyānasukhasparśavihārairvihariṣyāmaḥ /
tgt_original: 」五百人復報言： 「我亦欲入山止空閑之處，快坐禪，無人來嬈我，我曹亦復聞佛說經不信不樂也。 」兩比丘復報言：

src_original: nirmitakāvavocatām- tena hi āyuṣmantaḥ saṃgāsyāmo na vivadiṣyāmaḥ /  avivādaparamā hi śramaṇasya dharmāḥ /
tgt_original: 「是事當共諦議不戲也，不爭者是為比丘法也。 何因為泥洹身中，有我有神有命有人有意耶？

src_original: tānyavocan- rāgadveṣamohānāṃ prahāṇāya vayaṃ pratipannāḥ /
tgt_original: 」五百人復報言： 「盡婬盡怒盡癡，是為泥洹。

src_original: nirmitakāvavocatām- kiṃ punarāyuṣmatāṃ saṃvidyante rāgadveṣamohā yān kṣapayiṣyatha?
tgt_original: 」兩比丘復問言： 「卿曹婬怒癡悉盡未？

src_original: tānyavocan- na te 'dhyātmaṃ na bahirdhā nobhayamantareṇopalabhyante,  nāpi te 'parikalpitā utpadyante /
tgt_original: 」五百人復報言： 「亦無內亦無外也。

src_original: [mā vikalpayata] /  yadā cāyuṣmanto na kalpayiṣyatha na vikalpayiṣyatha,  tadā na raṃkṣyatha na viraṃkṣyatha /
tgt_original: 當莫著亦莫不著，雖不著莫不著，是為泥洹。

src_original: atha teṣāṃ pañcānāṃ bhikṣuśatānāmanupādāyāśravebhyaścittāni vimuktānyabhūvan /  tāni vimuktacittāni yena bhagavāṃstenopasaṃkrāntāni /  upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasābhivandyaikānte nyasīdan /
tgt_original: 」爾時兩比丘說是經法，五百人皆得阿羅漢道，五百人屈還至佛所。

src_original: bhikṣūnetadavocat- kutrāyuṣmanto gatāḥ kuto vāgatāḥ te 'vocan- na kvacidgamanāya na kutaścidāgamanāya bhadanta subhūte bhagavatā dharmo deśitaḥ āha- ko nāmāyuṣmatāṃ śāstā?
tgt_original: 「諸賢者去至何所？
